FuncDef:
The resource cpu weight command assigns CPU weight to a virtual system (VS).
The undo resource cpu weight command restores the default CPU weight of a VS.
By default, CPU weight values assigned to Admin-VS and other VSs are 10 and 5 respectively.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies CPU weight.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 10.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To assign CPU weight to a VS, run the resource cpu weight command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
